    • cryptFiles

      public void cryptFiles​(java.lang.String nomefile, int part, int cut, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String CutSize, java.lang.Boolean CutType) throws java.io.IOException, CryptoException
      This method split and cipher all file's parts
      Parameters:
      nomefile - File's name
      part - File's part
      cut - File's cut
      password - File's password for cipher
      CutSize - bytes, kilobytes, megabytes,...
      CutType - same size, custom size
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
      CryptoException - Crypt Exception
